sections.changelog:
2025-05-27 - version 1.0.0-rc.3

  • New: Brand new admin dashboard with better UI/UX and with lot of new features, improvements.
  • Improvement: Multiple UI/UX improvements.
  • Improved codebase with best coding practices.

2025-04-17 - version 0.0.6

  • Internal: Astra-Notices library updated to the latest version.
  • Fix: Course Builder - Rearranging lessons in the course section is not auto save.
  • Fix: Course Builder - Deleted lesson still visible in the builder area which is not accessible.

2025-03-12 - version 0.0.5

  • New: Capability of reorder course sections in the course.
  • New: Capability of reordering lessons into different course sections.
  • Fix: Empty p tags were added in the content of the lesson content.

2025-02-10 - version 0.0.4

  • Fix: PHP Notice: _load_textdomain_just_in_time was called incorrectly. Translation loading for the suredash-pro domain was triggered too early.
  • Fix: "Install SureDash" notice CTA will leads to "plugin not found" error.

2025-01-28 - version 0.0.3

  • Improvement: Displaying premium plugin incompatibility admin notice on all dashboard screens instead of the only plugins page.

2025-01-24 - version 0.0.2

  • New: Introducing tooltip for lesson navigation for better user experience.
  • New: Introducing badges for the lessons to track the course progress effectively.
  • Improvement: Introduced minimum version notice setup for compatibility with the SureDash Premium plugin.

2025-01-02 - Version 0.0.1-alpha.3

  • Feature: Added licensing system for the plugin.
  • Improvement: Added internationalization support for the plugin.
  • Improvement: Coding standards improved as per w.org guidelines.

2024-12-02 - Version 0.0.1-alpha.2

  • Improvement: Page builder support added for popular page builders for lessons creation.

2024-11-28 - Version 0.0.1-alpha.1

  • Initial Release.
